Opticomlib Python Library
=========================

Package includes:

* **opticomlib.typing** - type hints for opticomlib
* **opticomlib.utils** - utility functions
* **opticomlib.devices** - electro-optical devices
* **opticomlib.lab** - laboratory equipment 

.. currentmodule:: opticomlib

.. autosummary::
   :toctree: _autosummary

   typing
